import {useState} from 'react' const AddItem=(props)=>{ const [ifisedit,setifisedit]=useState(props.itemtoedit?true:false) debugger const[itemform,setitemform]=useState ({id:props.itemtoedit.id,name:props.itemtoedit.name,price:props.itemtoedit.price ,img:props.itemtoedit.img }) return
setitemform({...itemform,id:e.target.value})} value={itemform.id || ''} > setitemform({...itemform,name:e.target.value})} value={itemform.name || ''} > setitemform({...itemform,price:e.target.value})} value={itemform.price || ''} > setitemform({...itemform,img:e.target.value})} value={itemform.pic || ''} > ifiseditprops.onAdd(itemform)}>
{itemform.id}--- {itemform.name}--- {itemform.price}--- {itemform.img}
} export default AddItem;
